net.wombatrpgs.rainfall.graphics
Interface Renderable

All Known Implementing Classes:
Anim, DirAnim, Event, FourDir, Level, MapObject
public interface Renderable

All objects that are to be drawn to the screen must implement this. It just contains a basic render method... for now.

Method Summary
 void render(com.badlogic.gdx.graphics.OrthographicCamera camera)
          Render yourself to the screen using OpenGL.
 

Method Detail

render

void render(com.badlogic.gdx.graphics.OrthographicCamera camera)
Render yourself to the screen using OpenGL. Nothing needs to be passed here because OpenGL is one giant statemachine clusterfuck.

Parameters:
camera - The camera to render with, may or may not be used
